      • getPost

        public Post[] getPost​(User user,
                      int pageNo,
                      int recPerPage)
        To view more posts while browsing TODO: To call after login, not in this module
        Specified by:
        getPost in interface ISocialNetwork
        Parameters:
        user - - current login user
        pageNo - - for lazy load (to call upon next scroll or click on next page) start with 1
        recPerPage - - for lazy load (no. of post shown in one load) if no pagination set to 0
        Returns:
        Post[] - post loaded according to the provided pageNo and no. of record

                            int recPerPage)

        getComment in interface ISocialNetwork
